lines.gurmukhi: jau hm ADm krm kY piqq Bey piqq pwvn pRB nwm pRgtwieE hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jau Ham Adham Karam Kai Patit Bhaay , Patit Paavan Prabh Naam Pragataaiao Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If we have fallen from your favour due to our evil and unrighteous deeds, then 0 Lord! You have made known that You bless the sinners with Your grace and make them good and pious.

lines.gurmukhi: jau Bey duiKq Aru dIn prcIn lig dIn duK BMjn ibrdu ibrdwieE hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jau Bhaay Doukhit Aru Deen Paracheen Lagi , Deen Doukh Bhanjan Biradu Biradaaiao Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If we are suffering due to our ill deeds and sins of the previous births, then 0 Lord! You have made it conspicuous that You dispel the sufferings of the poor and destitudes.

lines.gurmukhi: jau gRsy Ark suq nrk invwsI Bey nrk invwrn jgq jsu gwieE hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jau Grasay Arak Sout Narak Nivaasee Bhaay , Narak Nivaaran Jagat Jasu Gaaiao Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If we are in the grip of the angels of death and become deserving of a life in hell because of our bad and evil deeds, then 0 Lord ! The whole world is singing Your paeans that You are the liberator of all from the vagaries of hell.

lines.gurmukhi: gun kIey gun sB koaU krY kiRpw inDwn Avgun kIey gun qohI bin AwieE hY ]504]
lines.transliteration_english: Goun Keeay Goun Sabh Kooo Karai Kripaa Nidhaana! , Avagoun Keeay Goun Tohee Bani Aaiao Hai ?504?

Shabad OS B.translation: O store house of clemency! One. who does good to others begets good in returns. But doing good to low and evil doers like us behoves only You. (You alone can bless and forgive the sins and evil deeds of all).  (504)
